lines:
bros

de vos

De a brushed von here

Lastern states of America. I 
Sincerely hope that the result 
of your labour towards the Chines 
will in the near future elevate 
China as a nation before du 
eyes of the World for good 
works and good Government.

Enclosed please recive a 
draft for five hundred 
dollan god (1500) which 
Ghope will be sufficient sor. 
the tuition & maintenance & 
en son tet. Kwan, and the 
acknowledgement opsance shall 
be appreciated by

Hours mat truly

K. S. kwan

ten wollen

185N

Nda

Name

voor wanna

Na

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter thanking Stearns for his kindness to Kwan's son, and his devotion to the Chinese students' education in a Christian liked spirit. He hopes that Stearns' labor will elevate China as a nation of good works and good government. Kwan enclosed $500 for tuition and expenses for his son.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
